H0.text: what was the name of the first continent. **Gondwana**

H1.text: what was the name of the first continent. **Rodinia**

H2.text: what was the name of the first continent. **Columbia**

H3.text: what was the name of the first continent. Pangaea

A4.text: Rogers and Santosh were the first to give a complete reconstruction of a Paleoproterozic supercontinent preceding Rodinia.

A5.text: Columbia is thought to have existed approximately 2,500 to 1,500 million years ago.
